articles.description: Jake Gyllenhaal takes a tense emergency call in Antoine Fuqua and Nic Pizzolatto's Netflix remake of the Danish thriller. Read the Empire review.

articles.title: Dave Grohl reveals Kurt Cobain's death inspired him to found Foo Fighters - Daily Mail
articles.description: The rock band's lead singer, 52, admitted he bolted from the USA and headed to Ireland in a bid to 'soul search' but was reminded of his idol on the front of a stranger's T-shirt.
articles.content:
Dave Grohl revealed that Kurt Cobain's death inspired him to found the Foo Fighters, in an appearance on The Graham Norton Show on Friday.
The former Nirvana drummer, 52, admitted he bolted from the… [+5534 chars]

articles.title: Kym Marsh extends break from Morning Live as she cares for father and works on her mental health - Daily Mail
articles.description: Speaking to her co-star Gethin Jones on the daytime programme, she said: 'I've been off and one of the reasons for that is I want to be here for my dad.'
articles.content:
Kym Marsh has revealed her two month absence from BBC's Morning Live has been due to caring duties for her cancer-stricken father, as well as her anxiety attacks.
